document.full_text: cuba's highest court has received an appeal by u.s. aid contractor alan gross seeking to overturn a 15-year jail sentence handed down last month for crimes against the cuban state, the head of the court said on saturday.
document.title: cuban court studying appeal from u.s. contractor
lines_and_colors: cuba's highest court has received an appeal by u.s. aid contractor alan gross seeking to overturn a 15-year jail sentence handed down last month for crimes against the cuban state, the head of the court said on saturday.
